data.system_settings: ZTE Blade Vantage, Android 7.0 (Reported for mrkirby153#7840)
data.expected_result: Custom Emoji should appear in the emoji list.
data.short_description: Custom Emoji Unavailable on Android Alpha 6.8.8
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to Android Alpha 6.8.8 - Go to a server where it have custom emoji or have permissions to post one. - Type out an custom emoji - Observe
